spells.name: Blade Lash
spells.description: Use your weapon like a whip to trip an opponent.

spells.name: Blurred Movement
spells.description: As blur, but only while you are moving.

spells.name: Glue Seal
spells.description: Makes one 5-ft. square or one object sticky.

spells.name: Line in the Sand
spells.description: Increase your attacks of opportunity per round.

spells.name: Long Arm
spells.description: Your arms lengthen, giving you extra reach.

spells.name: Monkey Fish
spells.description: Gain a climb speed and a swim speed of 10 ft. for a time.

spells.name: Phantom Blood
spells.description: Gain temporary hp if Con loss would knock you out or kill you.

spells.name: Sunder Breaker
spells.description: The next weapon that sunders an item belonging to the target takes damage.

spells.name: Sundering Shards
spells.description: Sundered item explodes, dealing 1d6 damage to adjacent creatures.

spells.name: Wave Shield
spells.description: Water blunts one incoming attack or fire effect.
